name: interoffice
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or involving the different parts of a company: She discovered the papers in her interoffice mail. Our interoffice communication is fast and accurate.
More examplesFewer examplesThese changes will allow us to operate effectively across inter-office and organizational boundaries.Fake invoices are an old trick designed to capitalize on poor interoffice communication.They wrote an inter-office memo to their boss.Senior managers travel frequently, but they also hold plenty of interoffice discussions using the internet.
